name: METATRON CUBE
description: METATRON CUBE - Explore and investigate a mysterious space installation. Overcome the obstacles, enemies and discover what is Metatron and what is its purpose.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
